com.defano.jmonet.tools.attributes

Interface ToolAttributes

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ObservableToolAttributes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RxToolAttributes

    public interface ToolAttributes
extends ObservableToolAttributes
    A set of attributes provided to all JMonet tools (although not every tool will use every attribute).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_SHAPE_SIDES 
      static int MIN_SHAPE_SIDES 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Interpolation getAntiAliasing()
      Gets the anti-aliasing interpolation mode used by this tool.
      BoundaryFunction getBoundaryFunction()
      Gets the function used to detect when paint flooding a region has reached a boundary.
      default int getConstrainedAngle()
      Gets the angle (in degrees) that the tool should be constrained to when the shift-key is held down.
      default int getCornerRadius()
      Gets the radius, in pixels, of the rounded corners drawn by this tool.
      default Color getEraseColor()
      Gets the color of the pixel that erased pixels are changed to, or null if erased pixels should be fully transparent (default behavior).
      FillFunction getFillFunction()
      Gets the function used to color the canvas with paint flooding a region.
      default Optional<Paint> getFillPaint()
      Gets the paint used to fill the item drawn by the tool.
      default Font getFont()
      Gets the text font drawn by the tool.
      default Color getFontColor()
      Gets the color of the text drawn by the tool.
      default double getIntensity()
      Gets the intensity (opacity) of the paint drawn by this tool.
      default double getMagnificationStep()
      Gets the value by which the canvas scale factor is multiplied or divided when zooming in or zooming out.
      MarkPredicate getMarkPredicate()
      Gets the predicate function used to determine if a canvas pixel is considered "marked," not blank (for example, used in determining if the pencil tool should mark or erase).
      default double getMaximumScale()
      Gets the maximum allowable scale factor that this tool can adjust the active canvas to.
      default double getMinimumScale()
      Gets the minimum allowable scale factor that this tool can adjust the active canvas to.
      default int getShapeSides()
      Gets the number of sides of the shape drawn by this tool.
      default Stroke getStroke()
      Gets the stroke (the pen or brush outline) drawn by the tool.
      default Paint getStrokePaint()
      Gets the paint used to stroke or outline the item drawn by the tool.
      default boolean isDrawCentered()
      Gets the state of the draw centered flag.
      default boolean isDrawMultiple()
      Gets the state of draw multiple flag.
      default boolean isPathInterpolated()
      Indicates whether path interpolation is enabled; when true, certain paths (like those used by the airbrush) are interpolated, resulting in a smoother (albeit more computationally expensive) rendering.
      default boolean isRecenterOnMagnify()
      Gets whether the canvas scroll position should be updated when zooming in or out to recenter the pixel that was clicked with the magnifier tool.
      void setBoundaryFunction(BoundaryFunction boundaryFunction)
      Sets the function used to detect when paint flooding a region has reached a boundary.
      void setFillFunction(FillFunction fillFunction)
      Sets the function used to color the canvas with paint flooding a region.
      void setMarkPredicate(MarkPredicate markPredicate)
      Sets the predicate function used to determine if a canvas pixel is considered "marked," not blank (for example, used in determining if the pencil tool should mark or erase).

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.tools.attributes.ObservableToolAttributes

        getAntiAliasingObservable, getConstrainedAngleObservable, getCornerRadiusObservable, getDrawCenteredObservable, getDrawMultipleObservable, getEraseColorObservable, getFillPaintObservable, getFontColorObservable, getFontObservable, getIntensityObservable, getMagnificationStepObservable, getMaximumScaleObservable, getMinimumScaleObservable, getPathInterpolationObservable, getRecenterOnMagnifyObservable, getShapeSidesObservable, getStrokeObservable, getStrokePaintObservable, setAntiAliasingObservable, setConstrainedAngleObservable, setCornerRadiusObservable, setDrawCenteredObservable, setDrawMultipleObservable, setEraseColorObservable, setFillPaintObservable, setFontColorObservable, setFontObservable, setIntensityObservable, setMagnificationStepObservable, setMaximumScaleObservable, setMinimumScaleObservable, setPathInterpolationObservable, setRecenterOnMagnifyObservable, setShapeSidesObservable, setStrokeObservable, setStrokePaintObservable

    • Method Detail

      • getStroke

        default Stroke getStroke()
        Gets the stroke (the pen or brush outline) drawn by the tool.
        Returns:
        The active stroke.

      • getStrokePaint

        default Paint getStrokePaint()
        Gets the paint used to stroke or outline the item drawn by the tool.
        Returns:
        The stroke paint.

      • getFillPaint

        default Optional<Paint> getFillPaint()
        Gets the paint used to fill the item drawn by the tool.
        Returns:
        The fill paint.

      • getFont

        default Font getFont()
        Gets the text font drawn by the tool.
        Returns:
        The text font.

      • getFontColor

        default Color getFontColor()
        Gets the color of the text drawn by the tool.
        Returns:
        The text font color.

      • getShapeSides

        default int getShapeSides()
        Gets the number of sides of the shape drawn by this tool.
        Returns:
        The number of shape sides.

      • getEraseColor

        default Color getEraseColor()
        Gets the color of the pixel that erased pixels are changed to, or null if erased pixels should be fully transparent (default behavior).
        Returns:
        The erase color or null

      • getConstrainedAngle

        default int getConstrainedAngle()
        Gets the angle (in degrees) that the tool should be constrained to when the shift-key is held down.
        Returns:
        The constrained angle, in degrees.

      • getIntensity

        default double getIntensity()
        Gets the intensity (opacity) of the paint drawn by this tool. A value in the range [0.0, 1.0] where higher values represent greater paint intensity.
        Returns:
        The tool intensity.

      • isDrawMultiple

        default boolean isDrawMultiple()
        Gets the state of draw multiple flag.
        Returns:
        The draw multiple flag.

      • isDrawCentered

        default boolean isDrawCentered()
        Gets the state of the draw centered flag.
        Returns:
        The draw centered flag.

      • getCornerRadius

        default int getCornerRadius()
        Gets the radius, in pixels, of the rounded corners drawn by this tool.
        Returns:
        The corner radius.

      • getAntiAliasing

        default Interpolation getAntiAliasing()
        Gets the anti-aliasing interpolation mode used by this tool.
        Returns:
        The anti-aliasing interpolation mode.

      • getMaximumScale

        default double getMaximumScale()
        Gets the maximum allowable scale factor that this tool can adjust the active canvas to. For example, when set to 32.0 the magnifier tool will not be able to magnify the canvas greater than 32x.
        Returns:
        The maximum allowable scale factor this tool will adjust to.

      • getMinimumScale

        default double getMinimumScale()
        Gets the minimum allowable scale factor that this tool can adjust the active canvas to. For example, when set to 1.0 the magnifier tool will not be able to zoom out (shrink the image) past its normal size.
        Returns:
        The minimum allowable scale factor this tool will adjust to.

      • isRecenterOnMagnify

        default boolean isRecenterOnMagnify()
        Gets whether the canvas scroll position should be updated when zooming in or out to recenter the pixel that was clicked with the magnifier tool. Has no effect when the active canvas is not embedded in a scroll pane and managed via a SurfaceScrollController.
        Returns:
        True if the clicked pixel will be centered in the scroll pane when zooming in or out; false otherwise.

      • getMagnificationStep

        default double getMagnificationStep()
        Gets the value by which the canvas scale factor is multiplied or divided when zooming in or zooming out. For example, when this value is 2.0, zooming in causes the scale factor to be multiplied by 2 thus scaling the canvas from its original size to 2x, then 4x, then 8x and so forth.
        Returns:
        The zoom in/out scale multiple

      • isPathInterpolated

        default boolean isPathInterpolated()
        Indicates whether path interpolation is enabled; when true, certain paths (like those used by the airbrush) are interpolated, resulting in a smoother (albeit more computationally expensive) rendering.
        Returns:
        True when path interpolation is enabled.

      • getMarkPredicate

        MarkPredicate getMarkPredicate()
        Gets the predicate function used to determine if a canvas pixel is considered "marked," not blank (for example, used in determining if the pencil tool should mark or erase).
        Returns:
        The current mark predicate function

      • setMarkPredicate

        void setMarkPredicate(MarkPredicate markPredicate)
        Sets the predicate function used to determine if a canvas pixel is considered "marked," not blank (for example, used in determining if the pencil tool should mark or erase).
        Parameters:
        markPredicate - The mark predicate function

      • getBoundaryFunction

        BoundaryFunction getBoundaryFunction()
        Gets the function used to detect when paint flooding a region has reached a boundary. See BoundaryFunction for details.
        Returns:
        The current boundary function in use.

      • setBoundaryFunction

        void setBoundaryFunction(BoundaryFunction boundaryFunction)
        Sets the function used to detect when paint flooding a region has reached a boundary. See BoundaryFunction for details.
        Parameters:
        boundaryFunction - The boundary function to use.

      • getFillFunction

        FillFunction getFillFunction()
        Gets the function used to color the canvas with paint flooding a region. See FillFunction for details.
        Returns:
        The fill function being used.

      • setFillFunction

        void setFillFunction(FillFunction fillFunction)
        Sets the function used to color the canvas with paint flooding a region. See FillFunction for details.
        Parameters:
        fillFunction - The fill function to use
